text: David Hicks (born 1975) is an Australian formerly detained at Guantanamo Bay. David Hicks may also refer to: *David Hicks (chaplain) (born 1942), US Army Chief of Chaplains *David Hicks (ski jumper) (born 1945), American ski jumper *David Hicks (basketball) (born 1988), American basketball player in Israel *David Nightingale Hicks (1929–1998), British interior designer *David L. Hicks (born 1963), American Anglican bishop *Dave Hicks (motorcyclist) from Castrol Six Hour *David Hicks (editor) on All-American Girl: The Mary Kay Letourneau Story *David Hicks (film editor) on Naked City: Justice with a Bullet
title: David Hicks (disambiguation)
